title: Growth Rate Comparison
description: Interactive visualization comparing growth rates of logarithmic, polynomial, and exponential functions to understand dominance relationships and predict limit behavior.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Functions
Limits
Growth Rates
Exponential Functions
Logarithmic Functions
Polynomial Functions

educational.targetAudience: AP Calculus students, College Calculus students
educational.learningObjective: Students will compare growth rates of logarithmic, polynomial, and exponential functions to predict limit behavior.

controls.label: Function toggles
controls.description: Enable/disable individual functions: ln(x), log10(x), sqrt(x), x, x^2, x^3, 2^x, e^x, 10^x

controls.label: X-Range
controls.description: Adjust the maximum x value to see growth at different scales

controls.label: Race!
controls.description: Animate functions growing from x=1 to x=max

controls.label: Reset
controls.description: Reset animation and x-range to initial values

controls.label: Y-Scale
controls.description: Switch between linear and logarithmic y-axis scaling

controls.label: Ratio Mode
controls.description: Display ratio of two functions to see dominance relationships
